ISSUE.TITLE: There is no preview part to add
ISSUE.DESCRIPTION: Configuring the Preview feature for Blog Posts [this guide](https://docs.orchardcore.net/en/dev/docs/guides/decoupled-cms/), you describe: - Edit the content definition of Blog Post, click Add Parts, then select Preview. Click Save. - In the list of parts, for Preview, click on Edit to change its settings for this content type. - In the Pattern textbox, enter /blogpost/{{ ContentItem.Content.AliasPart.Alias }} which is the way to generate the same URL as the route which is configured in the Razor page. But there is no **Preview Part** at that list of Content Parts. How can I add the preview part to PostBlog definition type? [Screenshot](https://github.com/devhomecali/OrchardCore/blob/master/PreviwPart-NoFound.png)
